Question: Often, his surname is misspelled (and thus mispronounced) as "this personh", among other variations.
Hints: On September 8, 2007, this person performed his 1,000th live show at Idaho Falls, Idaho.

Demento appeared in several of this person's earlier videos, such as "I Love Rocky Road" and "Ricky".
